text: hrux phwk khea klaw wa khea (muhammad) di plxm pæ lng xal ku rxa nkhu nma (muhammad) cng klaw theid dangnan phwk than cng na ma sak sib su reaa hˌ thi thuk plxmpælng khun hı di xya ngxalkurxan læa phwk than cng reiyk phu thi mi khwam samarth nı hmu phwk than xun ca kxallxhˌ (hı ma chwy) tha phwk than pen phu saty cring
